actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: To direct the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to establish a competitive grant program to award grants to States and local governments for purposes of assisting entrepreneurs planning to start a small business concern.
short_title: Startup in a Day Act of 2019

titles.title: Startup in a Day Act of 2019

To direct the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to establish a competitive grant program to award grants to States and local governments for purposes of assisting entrepreneurs planning to start a small business concern.
